channel.title: I am so confused... no SCARS are working for me....need help badly
channel.description: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:im really confused :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:... none of the scars are working for me... im not sure if its me or the scripts, but i really need some help.... ive also been looking through many tutorials and none of them are very helpful... if anyone could help me out here it would be greatly appreciated

item.title: I am so confused... no SCARS are working for me....need help badly
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Ok go to script and then compile, if you get an error then post it.
If it compiles then make sure you have dragged the crosshairs over the runescape window and set all the variables before you run it.

Read full topic

item.title: I am so confused... no SCARS are working for me....need help badly
item.dc:creator: @steveispoop steveispoop
item.description:
@steveispoop wrote:

this is an example

Program IronPowerMiner;
{.include SSI2.txt}
{.include boxbreaker.txt}
Var
switch : boolean;
//TMouse taken from SSI2 Mouse function
Procedure TMouse(mousex,mousey,ranx,rany:integer; left:boolean);
var a,b,c:integer;
begin
MMouse(mousex,mousey,ranx,rany);
GetMousePos(b,c);
HoldMouse(b+1,c,left);
repeat
wait(10+random(40));
a:=a+1;
until(a>4);
GetMousePos(b,c);
ReleaseMouse(b,c,left);
End;

Procedure FindRock;
Var
x1, y1, x2, y2, tolerance: integer;
Begin
x1 := 138;
y1 := 156;
x2 := 378;
y2 := 220;
tolerance := 4;
If (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, 2437457, x1, y1, x2, y2, tolerance)) Then
Begin
//MMouse(x, y, 2, 2);
TMouse(x, y, 10, 5, true);
End;
End;

Begin
ActivateClient;
SetupSSI;
switch:=false
Repeat
FindBox;
FindRock;
If (GetColor(714, 444) = 2174283) Then //Check if invatory is full
switch := true;
Sleep(2500);
Until(switch)
End.

and it says things like

Line 10: [Error] (10:1): Unknown identifier ‘MMouse’ in script
or things like, expected colon

Read full topic
